name.baseName: Paving ; Plywood, other wood-based panels (non-wood-based panels, engineered wood panels, plywood, reconstituted decorative wood, veneered wood panels, etc.) ; Adhesives (water-based) ; Shaping ; All sizes; NESPS2
铺装 ; 胶合板、其他人造板（非木质人造板、细工木板、胶合木、重组装饰材、饰面人造板等） ; 胶粘剂（水性） ; 定型 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of dust removal equipment (kWh) / (rated power of dust removal equipment (kW) × dust removal equipment operating time (hours))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of dust removal equipment (kWh) / (rated power of dust removal equipment (kW) × dust removal equipment operating time (hours))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程用于生产各种木质板材，包括铺装胶合板和其他人造木材如非木质人造板、细工木板、胶合木、重组装饰材和饰面人造板等。在成型阶段使用的水性胶粘剂是粘合这些木材产品各层的关键材料。这些材料通常用于建筑、家具制造和室内设计。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码20,三级代码202.0文件，在完整版文件中第349页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为胶合板、其他人造板（非木质人造板、细工木板、胶合木、重组装饰材、饰面人造板等），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of dust removal equipment (kWh) / (rated power of dust removal equipment (kW) × dust removal equipment operating time (hours))
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
